hints.content: Which of the shapes also has $4$ equal sides?

This shape belongs in the group:

[[☃ image 1]]

options.alt: A four-sided shape. Each side is labeled 4 centimeters. The corners of the shape are right angles. !

question.content:
The following shapes all belong to the same group.

 | | 
- | - | -
![A four-sided shape. Each side is labeled 7 centimeters. The corners of the shape are not right angles.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/93514dfe54d3cb4511c309007fda5b67212fb88a) | ![A four-sided shape. Each side is labeled 8 centimeters. The corners of the shape are not right angles.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/f2b0dd919219f5f7f8588780aadd4cfa210303b2) | ![A four-sided shape. Each side is labeled 9 centimeters. The corners of the shape are not right angles.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/2defbee52d2fa05f34fd0bdddaf4758076e9e50a)

All of the shapes have $4$ equal sides.

**Which of the following shapes belongs in the group?**

[[☃ radio 1]]

choices.content: ![A four-sided shape. The longer sides are labeled 15 centimeters each. The shorter sides are labeled 8 centimeters each. The corners of the shape are right angles.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/aaa6fb65570b855cbcfa3e89ece87c64387afce1)
![A four-sided shape. Each side is labeled 4 centimeters. The corners of the shape are right angles.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/2a41c1216b3e3ecad9391767b9bba2d970e3b2b5)

![A four-sided shape. The longer sides are labeled 12 meters each. The shorter sides are labeled 6 meters each. The corners of the shape are not right angles.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/0f3ce70b21d5dbffa13a4217b088a4ad6c091d32)

![A four-sided shape. The top side is labeled 2 meters, the bottom side is labeled 5 meters, the left side is labeled 4 meters, and the right side is labeled 3 meters. The corners of the shape are not right angles.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/d26fe1d1799416cdb625d535a6bf627368ccc33a)
